ygData.subject: Re: Muddy Work
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/6/1999 6:08:45 PM Central Standard Time, BobbiS7@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/6/1999 6:08:45 PM Central Standard Time,
BobbiS7@... writes:

<< Now that I'm back in Freeport, I came across some
Gator Meat and have the recipe, but not the jar.
Meat+Vinegar+Sauces in Jar.

Question is, what size Jar?

I don't believe I can put my "Jar" into a "Spit"
since both count as containers. nFreeport isn't
a bad spot to fire off some jars and them have
them melt in the Oven, getting more gator meat
sounds like a trip to Oasis.

Does a LARGE JAR like a Mixing Bowl yield a COMBINE?

Thanks

Cleric Taven [Veeshan] >>


Forget about the Jar, just use the meat, vinegar, and sauces in the spit and
combine.

Koliana
Warrior
Bristlebane
Leader of the Wandering Wolves of Norrath
